isis.stitle: DT/DTA-466 Diesel Engine Service (1990) - CYLINDER HEAD AND VALVES - CYLINDER HEAD INSPECTION - INSPECT FOR CRACKS (Using Dye Penetrant Method)

svcproc.title: INSPECT FOR CRACKS (Using Dye Penetrant Method)
svcproc.para:
Visually inspect for cylinder head cracks using the four step dye penetrant method as follows: (Refer to Figure 4.18
)

step1.para: Spray the cleaner onto the lower deck (gasket surface) of the head and wipe dry.
Spray on the dye penetrant. Allow the dye to remain on the surface from one to thirty minutes.
Wipe the dye off the surface.

note.para: Dye will remain in any cracks during the "wipe off" step.

step1.para: Spray on the developer and let dry for five to fifteen minutes.

figure.caption: Figure 4.18. Inspect for Cracks Using Dye Penetrant Method.

note.para: Cracks will show up as purple lines against the white developer. Refer to Figure 4.19.
IF ANY CRACKS ARE PRESENT, REPLACE THE CYLINDER HEAD.
